Safe String Module. More...

Detailed Description

Safe String Module.

Description:
The MPR provides a suite of safe string manipulation routines to help prevent buffer overflows and other potential security traps.
See also:
MprString, mprAsprintf, mprAllocStrcpy, mprAtoi, mprItoa, mprMemcpy, mprPrintf, mprReallocStrcat, mprSprintf, mprStaticPrintf, mprStrLower, mprStrTok, mprStrTrim, mprStrUpper, mprStrcmpAnyCase, mprStrcmpAnyCaseCount, mprStrcpy, mprStrlen, mprVsprintf, mprPrintfError, mprStrcat, mprAllocStrcpy, mprReallocStrcat, mprVasprintf
